0.title: Violations of Apportionment Standards
0.description: Provides that member of Legislature who offers, or participates in creation of, apportionment plan in violation of certain standards for establishing congressional or legislative district boundaries may be subject to penalties; provides for complaints; specifies actions that must be considered aggravating circumstances in determining whether member acted in bad faith or with malice.

1.last_action: Signed by Officers and filed with Secretary of State
1.title: Adjourning & Reconvening of Legislature/2015 Special Session C
1.description: Provides for adjourning & reconvening of each house of Legislature & provides for adjournment sine die during 2015 Special Session C.

2.title: Apportionment/Senatorial Districts
2.description: Apportions senatorial districts of state in accordance with U.S. Decennial Census of 2010 (plan H079S9073); provides for inclusion of omitted areas; provides contiguity for areas specified for inclusion in one senatorial district which are noncontiguous; specifies that apportioned districts constitute senatorial districts of state; provides for severability of invalid portions; provides for application beginning in 2016.

4.last_action: Died, not introduced, companion bill(s) passed, see HCR 1-C (Adopted)
4.title: Adjourning and Reconvening of the Legislature/Special Session C
4.description: Providing for adjourning and reconvening of each house of the Legislature and providing for adjournment sine die during the 2015 Special Session C, etc.

5.last_action: Failed to pass as amended by Conference Committee Report; YEAS 16 NAYS 23
5.title: Apportionment
5.description: Apportioning the senatorial districts of the state in accordance with the United States Decennial Census of 2010 (plan S040S9124); providing for the inclusion of omitted areas; specifying that the apportioned districts constitute the senatorial districts of the state; providing for severability of invalid portions, etc.
